contents: We are continously improving our documentation, in case you miss something, please get in contact with us   Technical documentation can be found on the GLSP GitHub   See here for the available support options
title: Documentation

contents: How to get involved with these guys
title: Getting Involved

contents: GLSP is an extensible open source framework to build custom diagram editors in the web/cloud. Those editors can be deployed stand-alone or integrated into a web-based IDE such as Eclipse Theia or VS Code. GLSP defines a language server protocol (LSP) for diagrams and integrates well with your existing tool chain and business logic.
title: GLSP

contents: Support for GLSP and for projects adopting GLSP is provided by
title: Support
